Package dal.versedal

Class VerseDAO

java.lang.Object
dal.versedal.VerseDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
IVerseDAO
public class VerseDAO extends Object implements IVerseDAO
The VerseDAO class implements the IVerseDAO interface and provides methods to interact with the data access layer for managing verses in the Encyclopedia of Arabic Poetry application.
